arm.name: arm
arm.transformationDescription:
[npc.her] fingers are the first to change as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the skin around [npc.her] digits start to darken and spread up [npc.her]. Meanwhile the skin around [npc.her] arms [npc.verb(start)] to tingle as [npc.her] skin starts to turn yellow around [npc.her] arms. [npc.Her] skin starts to take on a strange texture as it becomes softer and more fragile.
As the final areas of skin change colour, [npc.nameIsFull] is left with soft grub-like, [style.boldYellow(nymph arms and hands)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription].
arm.bodyDescription: [npc.She] [npc.has] [npc.armRows] arms, which are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.armFullDescription(true)]. [npc.Her] hands have formed into soft, nymph hands, complete smooth fingers and palms.
